Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: you need to drop into the numbered thread from gdb CLI

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: they are all numbered, and also have names, but gdb refers to them by the order they forked in, i think

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: `thread 0` or maybe `thread 2`, i think thread 1 is exiting normally, as alright said

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: by default it sticks with one execution path of children, i assume

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: so if you have fork=> fork => fork, it just chooses 1 of the 8 children to follow
